description:
Ryo is protecting Ayako, the widowed yakuza boss, but who will protect her favorite park when yakuza rivals burn it down?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 19 Sai no Miboujin! Sketch Bijin ni Kokoro no Koibito (Kouhen)
19歳の未亡人! スケッチ美人に心の恋人 (後編)
Nineteen Year-Old Widow! Lover in the Heart of a Beautiful Sketch Artist (Part 2)
